price: ಕೇಳಿರಿ: “ಏಳಾಕಾಶಗಳ ಮತ್ತು ಮಹಾ ಸಿಂಹಾಸನದ ಪರಿಪಾಲಕ ಯಾರು?”
arabic: قُلۡ مَن رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ ٱلسَّبۡعِ وَرَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

version.title: Kannada translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Kannada language, translated by Muhammad Hamza Battur.

meta.transliteration: qul man rabbu al-samāwāti al-sabʿi warabbu al-ʿarshi al-ʿaẓīmi
